altername_name: Barbarian II: The Dungeon of Drax
name: Barbarian II
overview: At the finale of BARBARIAN - THE ULTIMATE WARRIOR, the Barbarian defeated the warriors of Drax and thus freed Princess Mariana from his evil spell. Drax fled to the dungeons beneath his black castle, vowing to wreak disaster on the jewelled Kingdom. It is decided that there is only one way to stop Drax. The Barbarian and Mariana- herself an accomplished swordsman - are the only two warriors skilled enough to survive the perilous journey to Drax's lair. They must stop him before it's too late.
